message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.IT, cs.GT, cs.CY 

The paper discusses the application of economic and pricing models to address security issues in wireless networks, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses the integration of economic and pricing models with cryptography methods, which falls under the category of information theory (cs.IT). Game theory (cs.GT) is also mentioned as a relevant approach for modeling the behavior of attackers and defenders in wireless networks. Finally, the paper discusses the challenges and open issues in applying economic and pricing models to wireless security, which could fall under the category of cybernetics (cs.CY).
